game.name: Nightmare in the Old Mansion
game.shortDescription: Dive into the first-person horror of Nightmare in the Old Mansion and follow John, a real estate agent called to inspect an old mansion. Amid dark corridors and hidden secrets, you must make crucial choices to escape alive.
